attributes.action: stop macdonalds being allowed to give out A Level equivelant qualifications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For those who work incredibly hard in colleges and VI Forms across the United kingdom, who know how hard it is to manage timetables, tough deadlines and high amounts of coursework. 

How can working in a food chain and turning up to work match up to the experience of further education?
